dct_title_s: Clason's guide map of the Los Angeles district
dct_alternative_sm: Clason's Los Angeles map double index streets and house numbers
dct_description_sm: Relief shown (at peaks) by hachures and spot heights.
Indexes, legend, bar scale in miles.
Shows cemeteries, parks, streets, Pacific-Electric and Los Angeles railways, city limits, drainage, "soldiers home" north of Sawtelle.
Cover has illustration of silhouetted buildings, verso cover has Clason advert.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
